= Add a job to Coalition =
== Using a HTTP request ==

To add a job using the HTTP interface, simply GET or POST the url http://host:port/xmlrpc/addjob with the following options:

  * title : the title of the job
  * cmd : the full command of the job
  * priority : the priority of the job
  * affinity : the affinities of the job
  * retry : how many times the job should be retry

Example :

http://host:port/xmlrpc/addjob?title=job&cmd=echo toto&priority=1000&affinity=linux&retry=10
